00045 void TextLog::open(std::string const &name, bool toSyslog) {
00046   lock_type locker(m_lock);
00047   
00048   m_log.open(name.c_str());
00049   if( toSyslog!=m_syslog ) {
00050     m_syslog = toSyslog;
00051     if( m_syslog ) 
00052       ::openlog(TREX_SYSLOG_NAME, LOG_CONS, 0);
00053     else
00054       ::closelog();
00055   }
00056 }
00057 
00058 void TextLog::write(std::string const &text) {
00059   lock_type locker(m_lock);
00060   char const *str = text.c_str();
00061   size_t len = text.length();
00062 
00063   m_log.write(str, len);
00064   if( m_syslog ) 
00065     ::syslog(LOG_ERR, "%s", str);
00066   else
00067     m_log.flush();
00068 //   m_log<<text<<std::flush;
00069 }

00086 internals::LogEntry::~LogEntry() {
00087   if( 0!=m_buff.get() ) {
00088     std::string to_log = m_buff->str();
00089     if( !to_log.empty() ) {
00090       if( '\n'!=to_log[to_log.length()-1] )
00091        to_log.push_back('\n');
00092       m_owner.write(to_log);
00093     }
00094   }
